item.title: Blazor .NET 8 Server-side Rendering (SSR)
item.description: Blazor .NET 8 Server-side Rendering (SSR) Blazor .NET 8 offers several rendering options, including Server-side Rendering (SSR). SSR allows the initial rendering of a Blazor application to be performed on the server before being sent to the client. This approach provides benefits such as improved performance, SEO-friendliness, and better accessibility. In Blazor .NET 8, there are two main ways to implement SSR: Global SSR with Prerendering and Per Page/Component SSR with Prerendering.
